availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Pernecia Wadlington Miller (Caldwell County, Kentucky, housewife)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, housewife. Kentucky native. Daughter of William Wadlington. Married to William H. Miller. Mother of Rosa Miller, Josiah Miller, Hugh Miller, and Lula Miller. Student in Caldwell County 1850. Housewife in Caldwell County in 1860. Household owned five enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 345B.
